commit message:
Change 'Donate' preference to 'Support Voice Notify'.

Includes options:
-Donate (PayPal)
-Rate/Comment
-Contact Developer

Update version in strings and manifest.

Add quiet time.

-Use TimePickerDialog in Preferences to set start & end.

Use TAG & prefs statically from Common.
Implement OnPreferenceClickListener.
Use constants for quiet time dialog id's.
Remove unnecessary Preference cast.

Ignore notifications when call is active or ringing.


Make mHandler private.
Changes to project files by new SDK v14.
Ignore notifications when in silent or vibrate mode.

Change default audio stream to media.

Remove info logging for ignored_apps file not found.

Replace any of | [ ] { } * < > with a space.

Move version name from strings to manifest, change from 1.1.0 to 1.0.3.

Fix external audio Notification stream bug.

-Play blank message on Media stream after message on Notification stream.
-Bug only affected certain Android devices, mostly tablets.

Rename ttsStream to ttsParams.
Use break instead of return in switch cases.

Change no_note value in Paypal URL from 1 to 0.

Use Common.TAG directly in AppList.
Replace any space indentation with tabs.
